## Favorite Plot

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
cookies <- read.csv("cookies.csv")
cookies %>%
  group_by(Recipe_Index) %>%
  summarise(Num_Ingredients = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Num_Ingredients)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth=1, fill="pink", color="black") +
  labs(title="Number of Ingredients per Recipe", x="Number of Ingredients", y="Count of Recipes")

```
